title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 22.1 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 22.1 - Applications

State Regulations

The forms of applications for licenses to act as insurance agents pursuant to section
2103
of the Insurance Law are prescribed as follows: individuals; partnerships; corporations; limited liability companies. These forms may be obtained upon request by insurance companies or fraternal benefit societies to the Insurance Department, Albany, NY. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
22.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
